mapper.insert: INSERT INTO invitation (invite_id, movie_id, inviter_account, receiver_account, status, invite_time) VALUES (#{inviteId},#{movieId}, #{inviterAccount}, #{receiverAccount}, #{status}, #{inviteTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE invitation SET status = #{status} WHERE inviter_account = #{inviterAccount} and receiver_account = #{receiverAccount}
mapper.select: SELECT status FROM invitation WHERE inviter_account = #{inviterAccount} AND receiver_account = #{receiverAccount}
